div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1573 Seleuceia Pieria, Seleucis, 1932-1939 Burial: after 83 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 4 AE. From excavations Philip Philadelphus: contemp. forgeries of Antiocheia tetradr. Disposition: Antakya ? Waage, Antioch on the Orontes IV.2 (Princeton, 1952), p. 23, nos. 246-9
